meanings.definition: To show again or exhibit once more.
meanings.sent1: After the movie ended, the director decided to reshower it to the audience for a special screening.
meanings.sent2: The museum will reshower the rare painting next month for those who missed it the first time.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved reshowering the same card multiple times to confuse the audience.
meanings.sent4: The teacher reshowered the important lesson to ensure all students understood the concept clearly.
meanings.sent5: The chef reshowered the delicious dessert, making everyone want to try it again.
